sources.title: Long John Silver (1954) ROBERT NEWTON
sources.description:
Exclusive PizzaFLIX Movie Class Edition
Stars: Robert Newton, Connie Gilchrist, Lloyd Berrell, Rod Taylor
Director: Byron Haskin
Writer: Robert Louis Stevenson (characters)

Robert Newton returns to his iconic Pirate role in this CinemaScope sequel to Treasure Island.

CHAPTERS
00:00            Movie Class Introduction
01:53            Title Credits
03:17            Feature
01:47:36      Please Subscribe

sources.title: Long John Silver (1954) Robert Newton, Connie Gilchrist | Action, Adventure | Full Movie, Subtitles
sources.description:
Arrrgh!! The original ADVENTURE Restored to All its Theatrical Glory
Long John hopes to rescue his friend Jim from a rival pirate and return for more treasure.

Director: Byron Haskin
Writers: Martin Rackin, Robert Louis Stevenson (Character)
Stars: Robert Newton, Connie Gilchrist, Lloyd Berrell
Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Family
Original title: Long John Silver.  AKA: Long John Silver's Return to Treasure Island (1954)

00:00:00 Title credits - full movie
00:01:36 Opening scene - pirate ship
00:10:32 Making a deal with the governor
00:17:44 onboard with Captain Mendoza
00:25:42 Long John & Jim reconnect 
00:35:19 Proposal 
00:40:19 Jim's medallion
00:58:10 Onboard the Thistle 
01:09:19 Pirate party
01:24:38 Under fire
01:31:24 Chasing Jim

metadata.Plot: Documentary about the making of the film "Long John Silver" released theatrically.
